name: Heaps of Friends
description:
Heaps of Friends is a small physics based challenge game. It was made in ~30h for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the Theme: "Stronger Together". 

Reaching the end of the Levels won't be possible alone - so find yourself a lot of friends. Or even better: Heaps of Friends!

Controls:

A/D  -  Move left/right

W  -  Jump

J/L  -  Roll left/right

space  -  Grab with Hands + next Player

R  -  Reset Level

esc  -  Return to Main Menu
